name: Pico Pond
description:
Hold X or Z to ribbit.

Refresh the page to get a new frog.

If you're the only one in the pond, send this link to a friend! Each frog in the pond is another real person.

This is a demake of Frog Chorus by by v buckenham & Viviane Schwarz, which you can play here.

The frog sprite is a lightly modified version of Pixel Frog by scofanogd

Huge thanks to Sean S. LeBlanc for the breakdown of his Pico-8 twitter client which was key to getting the networking up and running!
